title: Krazy Komics
additional-note: A note in the 1970 CCE Periodicals volume for 'Krazy Comics' says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information, as did a note in the January-June 1977 CCE Periodicals volume for that title and for 'Krazy Komics'.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the July 1942 issue, and was filed in 1970. The actual issue covers appear to use the spelling 'Krazy Komics' consistently.
